review_text: My organization has worked with Modern Niagara for a couple custom design jobs in 2020 and 2021, and we were incredibly impressed with the professionalism and innovative approach from the team, in addition to a top-quality final products. We highly recommend Modern Niagara and will continue to work with the team on projects going forward. Special shout out to Blair and Reilly - we are so appreciative of you both!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelly   thank you very much for this note! As one of our Core Values, we take pride in the fact that you ve mentioned our professionalism along with our commitment to innovation! If you have any other comments, please feel free to reach out to Scott Black, Area Manager Modern Niagara Vancouver, at sblack@modernniagara.com.

review_text: Seems like a great place to work, plenty of tools supplied to employees amd work for years to come. Standards are high dont show up expecting a free ride.
Very pleased with the service we received. We ve had multiple techs come out, - Russel, Braeden, Marcel.

Unfortunately, they did not deliver on time but their customer  service was beyond reproach. Manager Gregg Knapfl and serviceman David Till bent over backwards to make sure the HVAC unit was replaced and repaired. The unit was delayed but when it was installed it worked beautifully.

Driver driving the company van on August 2, 6:20 pm on hwy1 near lougheed almost rammed into me then another car in the next lane then sped away. Drive however you want in your personal car but when using a company van, at least have some common sense that you are representing the company. If this firm cannot train their drivers/employees then it s just irresponsible. Everyone has somewhere to be, this company and it s driver is not more important than others on the road, they shouldn t be liable for a car crash. Train your drivers/employees for decency s sake and so they don t put the public at risk. Luckily my passenger was able to grab a photo.

Weve worked with Modern Niagara for many years, a lot of their techs are qualified and professional people, reasonably priced. But Im getting so sick and tired of their poor customer service.  Every time I have to call their Vancouver office and deal with Villy, it makes me reconsider my relationship with this company. She is so condescending and passive-aggressive, with a massive ego.  Every time I call I quietly pray to myself that I she doesnt pick up the phone.  Great company, just one glaring issue.

employee comes without bringing any detective tools and equipment! very unprofessional! gave us a wrong conclusion which mislead us! their price is high and doesnt match the service they provided! very disappointed
